channel.title: Please Read (: 317
channel.description: how do you prevent everyone from spawning a certain object except myself? for example: 'perfect' ring. if you can help thanks..

item.title: Please Read (: 317
item.dc:creator: @JavaLearner JavaLearner
item.description:
@JavaLearner wrote:

PI? Well go to your Commands.java and search for either ‘item’ or ‘pickup’ and change the number that goes with playerRights, like this:

FYI= 1 = moderator, 2 = admin, 3 = owner
=> You need to make sure you have owner rights: to check that, go to where your accounts are stored into a txt file and change your rights to 3 and then save it.

item.title: Please Read (: 317
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

yur dad 1234:

how do you prevent everyone from spawning a certain object except myself? for example: ‘perfect’ ring. if you can help thanks…

Make an array of forbidden spawn items
ex: public int[] unSpawnable = new int[] {773, #OTHER ITEM IDS#, #};
then make it loop through that array when spawning an item, and check if the item is one of the forbidden items.

Read full topic
